TopicTitle: Is there a way to suppress an alert for a specific craft/part/resource? (X is out of electric charge, etc).

Articles.Content:
I put an early game lander on the Mun that has lights and solar power. The batteries run out during Munar night; this is intended, they run down and then charge back up during the day. Despite this I get pop-up warnings whenever this happens, no matter what else I am doing in the game.

Is there a way to disable the warning for this craft? Or for the specific vessel resource (EC)? If not then there likely should be.

No but there really needs to be. I wish there was a way to just turn this notifications thing off altogether.

The ‘lack of stellar exposure’ notifications drive me mad - as if we are being punished for putting satellites into equatorial orbits.
